2.heading: Flintstone, Fred.
2.title: "But I Still Love Him"
2.author: [No author]
notes: Summary: Fred has mowed a swath to the lawn chair and stopped; Wilma is talking to her father's portrait. The lawnmower is a turtle.

3.heading: Flintstone, Fred.
3.title: "Doing This is Funny?"

notes: Summary: Dino sees Fred laughing at the comics page, then tries lying on his back on his own doghouse and only finds it painful.

27.title: The Flintstones [videorecording]
27.author: a Hanna-Barbera/Amblin Entertainment production ; Universal City Studios, Inc.
notes: Cast: John Goodman, Rick Moranis, Elizabeth Perkins, Rosie O'Donnell, Kyle MacLachlan, Halle Berry, Elizabeth Taylor.

Writers, Tom S. Parker, Jim Jennewein, Steven E. de Souza ; producer, Bruce Cohen ; director, Brian Levant ; music, David Newman ; executive producers, William Hanna, Joseph Barbera, Kathleen Kennedy, David Kirschner, Gerald R. Molen.

Summary (from OCLC cataloging): Cliff Vandercave & his accomplice plan a robbery but they need a stooge (Fred Flintstone) to take the rap. A sudden promotion (part of their scheme) puts Fred in the executive suite, while Barney's luck takes a turn for the worse.

44.heading: The Flintstones.
44.title: Big Time in Bedrock
44.author: adapted by Wendy S
44.appears_in: Larson ; based on a screenplay written by Tom S. Parker & Jim Jennewein and Steven E. de Souza.
notes: Summary: "Life has been good to the Flintstones lately. Fancy cars, new clothes, expensive jewelry, all they've ever wanted. Not so for their friends Barney and Betty. Hard times have forced the Rubbles to move in with Fred and Wilma. Will their friendship survive?"
" Illustrated with full-color photos from the new motion picture."

134.heading: The Flintstones--Articles About.
134.title: "Excavating Bedrock"
134.author: John Province
134.appears_in: p. 84-96 in Hogan's Alley, no. 9 (=v. 3, no. 1) (Summer 2001).
notes: Article on the beginnings of The Flintstones includes first-person accounts by creators Ed Benedict, Gene Hazleton, Roger Armstrong, Dale Hale, Scott Shaw!, June Foray, Chris Savino, and David Smith.
